item.title: Do we still care about Art?
item.description: In this post, I want to talk about how a movie that I watched years ago added some value in the current version of myself. How, now that I’m much older than back then, I see that the movie showed to me that art is much more important that I thought. How, even in my profession, there can be a noble purpose. Retrospective Sometimes we remember our infancy. We remember the toys we used to play with, the people we used to interact with, the lessons that we learned along the way (usually in the most painful way), and also we remember what we used to watch.
